articles.author: HealthDay
articles.title: 'Polypill' May Cut Heart Attack, Stroke Risk By 40% - WebMD
articles.description: The "polypill" containing three generic blood pressure medications and a statin dramatically reduced the risk of heart-related illness in people with no prior history of heart problems, according to clinical trial results.
articles.content:
